entry.title: $1850 // * Franklin Ave **Massive One Bed** Crazy Deal! *Separate kitchen!! Wow
entry.content:
AWESOME - LARGE FULL 1 BEDROOM
RIGHT OFF FRANKLIN AVE - AMAZING DEAL - GREAT PRICE!
Pictures don't do justice!!

Steps to Franklin Ave and its plethora of bars, cafes, and restaurants.
Also, Just steps to the Brooklyn botanical gardens, Prospect Park and the Brooklyn Museum

- Brand New completely Separate Kitchen.
- Granite countertops & Stainless steel appliances.
- Gorgeous hardwood floors.
- Big separate living room.
- Big pretty bedroom.

The apt is conveniently located steps from the 2. 3 .4. & 5 trains on Eastern Parkway and Franklin Ave.

* No dogs allowed, sorry!

Contact us to set up your viewing today!
This great deal will not last!
